Subject: Can't access to web gui after install EEP VM
Description:
Hello support, goodmorning 
i'm try to installa a EEP demo NFR solution on my labs.

i've install you solution on my lab scenario.
Stefania Oltean has suggest me to contact you for help me.
 
the installation it is goes well, but there is some problem about the connection network.
so, how i suggest to me, i have remove the eth interface, then create two new one, and confing ip addres from static mode  to dhcpmode.
afrter reboot, i can see receive the ip address from my dhcp server to this device,
but i try to access to that email addres i receive back an error
    
Connection failed

     An error occurred while connecting to 192.168.22.104.

    The site may be unavailable or overloaded. Try again in a few moments.
    If no page can load, check the computer's network connection.
    If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure Firefox has permissions to access the Web.


reading the specific, i see that you need of hyper-v 2016 min version.
but i've the hyper-v 2012 with SO Win server R2 datacenter
could be this the issue?
so it, can i know if i have any possibility to install your solution on my hyper-v 2012?

if you have a iso image i wil lworte from scratch the VM.
thanks
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer could not install an EPP image in his lab environment.
The conclusion is they were trying to use an older virtualization tool version which is not supported by EPP.
I provided the list of supported virtualization tools and versions.
